thread.title: Pictures show how British tank secured victory for Allies
thread.title_full: Pictures show how British tank secured victory for Allies

title: Pictures show how British tank secured victory for Allies
text: show ad 'Germany's downfall': Rare pictures show how the birth of the British tank changed the course of history securing victory for the Allies in the First World War Rare photographs show the British ingenuity that brought the dawn of the tank during the First World War From prototypes to the battlefield models, these images show the development of modern warfare New book brings together the images of Armoured Warfare in the First World War and show the differences between the Allies and the Germans
